name: All the Catastrophes
description:
*IMPORTANT*: May lag in some browsers. If it's lagging you may want to try another browser if you have one installed. Seems to work fine with Firefox.

I've been working on this the past few days. Nothing too serious, but I just wanted to throw it out there to see if anyone has any early thoughts/ideas/bugs. Also lmk how many days you could survive in the comments :)

What if not just a zombie apocalypse happened, but also an alien invasion, and maybe even more? Try to survive as long as possible in this really unfortunate scenario before you get overwhelmed!

Controls:

Move - WASD/Arrow keys

Shoot - Left Click

Aim - Move Mouse
